comment.text: Shelters ceramides and diacylglycerol lipids inside its START domain and mediates the intracellular trafficking of ceramides and diacylglycerol lipids in a non-vesicular manner.
Interacts with COL4A3. Interacts with VAPA and VAPB. Interaction with VAPB is less efficient than with VAPA.
Preferentially localized to the Golgi apparatus.
The START domain recognizes ceramides and diacylglycerol lipids, interacts with membranes, and mediates the intermembrane transfer of ceramides and diacylglycerol lipids.
The PH domain targets the Golgi apparatus.
The FFAT motif is required for interaction with VAPA and VAPB.

Phosphorylation on Ser-132 decreases the affinity toward phosphatidylinositol 4-phosphate at Golgi membranes and reduces ceramide transfer activity. Inactivated by hyperphosphorylation of serine residues by CSNK1G2/CK1 that triggers dissociation from the Golgi complex, thus down-regulating ER-to-Golgi transport of ceramide and sphingomyelin synthesis.

disease.name: Mental retardation, autosomal dominant 34
disease.description: A form of mental retardation, a disorder characterized by significantly below average general intellectual functioning associated with impairments in adaptive behavior and manifested during the developmental period.

comment.text: The disease is caused by mutations affecting the gene represented in this entry.
Was originally reported to have a protein kinase activity and to phosphorylate on Ser and Thr residues the Goodpasture autoantigen (in vitro).

feature.description: Found in a patient with mental retardation.
In MRD34; associated with authism and epilepsy.
Abolishes the phosphorylation. Strongly reduces the interaction with phosphatidylinositol 4-phosphate. Increases the ceramide transfer activity.
Impairs the endoplasmic reticulum-to-Golgi ceramide trafficking and abolishes the interaction with VAPA.
No effect on ceramide transfer activity.
Reduces affinity for membranes. Abolishes ceramide transfer; when associated with A-588.
Abolishes ceramide transfer; when associated with A-499.
